snippet: There appears to be no true count of how many people who borrowed to attend school are in default or having trouble paying back their loans.
lead_paragraph: There appears to be no true count of how many people who borrowed to attend school are in default or having trouble paying back their loans.

headline.seo: A Big Student Loan Default Problem, but How Big?
